title: Lady Gaga Looks Calm on Super Bowl-Eve | TMZ.com
text:
Lady Gaga Looks Calm on Super Bowl-Eve Lady Gaga Here's How I Do Super Bowl Prep 2/4/2017 12:46 PM PST 
Lady Gaga is prepping for her Super Bowl performance by posing with a Lamborghini ... because, of course. 
Gaga was out in Houston Saturday on Super Bowl-eve and apparently she's not sweating Sunday's big show cuz she looks cool as a cucumber. 
Talk about calm before the storm.
